mean_cn: v. 不承认，抵赖，拒绝对……承担责任
mean_en: to say that you are not responsible for (something) :to deny that you know about or are involved in (something)
word_etyma: dis否定 + avow承认 → disavow 否认
short_phrase: disavow you and shove you away
sentence: I totally disavow any promises I may have made to you.
sentence_trans: 我坚决不承认可能对你做过的任何承诺。
